title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin explains why it appears the Miami Dolphins are ready to move on from Tua Tagovailoa and why it's not really Tua's fault at this point. He believes it's time for Mike Tomlin be given proper respect after rumors about the USC job raises questions about his resume in the NFL. He also discusses the Lakers win over the Spurs without LeBron James and what this tells us about Russell Westbrook's fit in LA as they pursue a championship. Plus, Fox Sports college football analyst Joel Klatt joins the show to give his thoughts on Jim Harbaugh's must win game against Michigan State and who USC should be targeting for the head coaching position. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
